About

Hi! I'm Sean and this is my blog.

I'm a computer science student in Boston with interests in functional programming and concurrent computing. I've recently taken up learning Ruby.

Mirango.io content is served using nginx. All users connect using HTTPS and the server supports SPDY - the code is available here. The majority of content on mirango.io is static and created using Jekyll - code is available here.
